data.name: CrossPlanet
data.detailed_description:
Overview:
Arena shooter goes third person in CrossPlanet! With classic modes such as Team Deathmatch and Free for All, all the way to PVE modes such as Boss Battles (Assault) and a horde of enemy waves (Safeguard) CrossPlanet is packed with content so the fun never stops! We've got multiple maps, modes, mechanics and more! Mmm

PvP Multiplayer:
Experience a new take on player vs player area shooter combat. We've got Team Deathmatch, Free for All, Capture, Snipers, Elimination, a bobble head mode and much more! All playable on multiple maps from small 2v2 arenas to large scale 8v8 battlefields suited for vehicular and air unit combat.

PvE Modes:
Want to grab a squad of friends and take on waves of increasingly difficult enemies? You can do that, hop into "Safeguard" where you and up to 3 friends will need to protect a generator from the enemies that swarm you. Or maybe you'd prefer taking on the task of fighting a huge creature? Tackle our boss battles in "Assault" where enemies have increased health and will test your skill to the highest level.

Player Customization:
A wide range of soldier customization ensures player expression. From armor collections, skins, and weapon paint, to jetpacks, player banners and vehicle coatings. CrossPlanet ensures you can create a unique set of cosmetics for your profile so you can stand out amongst the crowd and show off to the masses in online multiplayer. Obtain these through in-game cosmetic rewards, or the storefront.

Custom games:
Grab a group of friends, set up a lobby and create unique gametypes/ settings so that you can have hours of fun. Maybe you want a huge score to win such as 500, or for everyone to have bobble heads, or maybe it's infinite ammo so that can you spray and pray!

Keyboard + Controller support:
CrossPlanet supports keyboard and mouse, along with both Xbox and Playstation gamepads, steam controller, and PC gamepads. No matter your input device, CrossPlanet is playable on what your weapon of choice.

data.short_description: Arena Shooter goes Third Person! CrossPlanet is a Sci-Fi shooter where players can go head-to-head in the online Multiplayer, or squad up with friends and take on thrilling boss battles against huge unearthly creatures.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K or Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 550 4GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700K or Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 8GB or AMD RX5700 8GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Combat/ Display of weapons and minor bleeding.
